title: 820-00923A PPVBAT_G3H_CHGR short to ground
message: Hello!, got this board 820-00923A which has short on PPVBAT_G3H_CHGR. Removed Q7040 to find that pad were burnt, but even with Q7040 removed there still was short. Later tried removing these components to solve short problem: Q7065, C7050, C7051, U7000, C7053, R7060, C7069, C7064, C7066, but not luck finding short. Anything i'm missing or pads on Q7040 busted? Thank you in advice for help 🙏

title: 820-00923A PPVBAT_G3H_CHGR short to ground
message:
Very likely short between copper layers.
As nothing to lose, you can try polishing the border of the hole.
